context: Tests whether the agent builds a PPTX extraction tool that follows the skill's specific python-pptx extraction patterns, file skip rules, and output schema.

checklist.name: Uses python-pptx
checklist.description: The extraction script imports and uses python-pptx (not another library like openpyxl or a subprocess call to LibreOffice)

checklist.name: Skips static files
checklist.description: Files with 'static' in the name are skipped and not present in extraction results

checklist.name: Skips conflict copies
checklist.description: Files matching a (N).pptx pattern (e.g., 'Deck (1).pptx') are skipped and not present in extraction results

checklist.name: Skips template files
checklist.description: Files with 'template' in the name are skipped and not present in extraction results

checklist.name: Background color extraction
checklist.description: Extracts background color as hex string (e.g., '#5B2C6F') from slide.background.fill, with fallback to slide layout background

checklist.name: Per-slide output schema
checklist.description: Each slide's output includes at least: slide_number, background_color_hex, background_type, layout_name, shape_count, has_image, has_speaker_notes, and a shapes_summary array

checklist.name: Global design statistics
checklist.description: Output includes a global_design section with at least: fonts_used (frequency count), background_colors (frequency count), and color_sequence (ordered list)

checklist.name: Shape type tracking
checklist.description: The extraction identifies auto-shape types (e.g., CLOUD_CALLOUT, EXPLOSION) and tracks them in the output, not just generic 'shape' labels

checklist.name: Font extraction
checklist.description: Extracts font name, font size, and font color from text runs within shapes

checklist.name: Footer detection
checklist.description: Identifies footer text by position â€” detecting text shapes in the bottom portion of the slide (approximately bottom 15%)

checklist.name: Recursive directory scan
checklist.description: Scans the input directory recursively using **/*.pptx glob pattern (not just top-level files)
